mapper.delete: delete from dm_report_channel_renew_stat where stat_day=#{statDay} and channel_label=#{channelLabel}
mapper.select:
select s.channelLabel, sum(s.30dayroi) day30YearRoi, sum(s.60dayroi) day60YearRoi, sum(s.90dayroi) day90YearRoi from ( SELECT c.CHANNEL_LABEL channelLabel, case when sum(c.ROI) is null then 0 else sum(c.ROI) end 30dayroi, 0 60dayroi, 0 90dayroi FROM DIM_CHANNEL_COST c where 1=1
AND c.ctime >= #{day30} AND c.ctime <= #{endDate} GROUP BY c.CHANNEL_LABEL union ALL SELECT c.CHANNEL_LABEL channelLabel, 0 30dayroi, case when sum(c.ROI) is null then 0 else sum(c.ROI) end 60dayroi, 0 90dayroi FROM DIM_CHANNEL_COST c where 1=1
AND c.ctime >= #{day60} AND c.ctime <= #{endDate} GROUP BY c.CHANNEL_LABEL union ALL SELECT c.CHANNEL_LABEL channelLabel, 0 30dayroi, 0 60dayroi, case when sum(c.ROI) is null then 0 else sum(c.ROI) end 90dayroi FROM DIM_CHANNEL_COST c where 1=1
AND c.ctime >= #{day90} AND c.ctime <= #{endDate} GROUP BY c.CHANNEL_LABEL ) s where 1=1 group by s.channelLabel
SELECT c.CHANNEL_LABEL channelLabel, c.FEE_TIME onlineTime FROM dim_channel_cost_union c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.FEE_TIME = #{onlineDate}

select s.CHANNEL_label channelLabel, sum(s.day30Cost) day30Cost, sum(s.day60Cost) day60Cost, sum(s.day90Cost) day90Cost from ( SELECT t.CHANNEL_label, sum(IFNULL(t.FEE_AMOUNT, 0)) day30Cost, 0 day60Cost, 0 day90Cost FROM dim_channel_cost_union t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.FEE_TIME >= #{onlineDate} AND t.FEE_TIME <= #{day30} AND t.CHANNEL_ID IN (SELECT a.channel_id FROM dim_channel_cost_union a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.fee_time = #{onlineDate}) group by t.CHANNEL_LABEL union all
SELECT t.CHANNEL_label, 0 day30Cost, sum(IFNULL(t.FEE_AMOUNT, 0)) day60Cost, 0 day90Cost FROM dim_channel_cost_union t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.FEE_TIME >= #{onlineDate} AND t.FEE_TIME <= #{day60} AND t.CHANNEL_ID IN (SELECT a.channel_id FROM dim_channel_cost_union a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.fee_time = #{onlineDate}) group by t.CHANNEL_LABEL union all
SELECT t.CHANNEL_label, 0 day30Cost, 0 day60Cost, sum(IFNULL(t.FEE_AMOUNT, 0)) day90Cost FROM dim_channel_cost_union t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.FEE_TIME >= #{onlineDate} AND t.FEE_TIME <= #{day90} AND t.CHANNEL_ID IN (SELECT a.channel_id FROM dim_channel_cost_union a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.fee_time = #{onlineDate}) group by t.CHANNEL_LABEL ) s where 1=1 and s.CHANNEL_label is not null
group by s.CHANNEL_label
